physicalTable.name: SAMP_ADDRESSES_D
physicalTable.description: Addresses Dimension table: Stores address attribute information. This information is mainly used for plotting maps within OBIEE visualization.

physicalColumns.name: Region
physicalColumns.description: Region: Stores the region information as a text

physicalColumns.name: State_Province
physicalColumns.description: State Provice: Stores the state province name as a text

physicalColumns.name: Ctry_Cd3_State_Name_City
physicalColumns.description: Country Code State Name City: Stores the country code concatenated with state name concatenated with city name

physicalColumns.name: Ctry_Cd3_State_Name
physicalColumns.description: Country Code State Name: Stores the country code concatenated with state name

physicalColumns.name: Country_Name
physicalColumns.description: Country Name: Stores country name as a text

physicalColumns.name: Address2
physicalColumns.description: Address2: Stores address2 as a text

physicalColumns.name: Iso_Country_code3
physicalColumns.description: ISO Country Code: Stores the ISO country code as a text

physicalColumns.name: Address_Key
physicalColumns.description: Address Key: Surrogate key of the address dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Address1
physicalColumns.description: Address1: Stores address1 as a text

physicalColumns.name: Area
physicalColumns.description: Area: Stores area information as a text

physicalColumns.name: Longitude
physicalColumns.description: Longitude: Stores the longitude information as a double

physicalColumns.name: Latitude
physicalColumns.description: Latitude: Stores the latitude information as a double

physicalColumns.name: Ctry_Cd3_State_Abbrv
physicalColumns.description: Country Code State Abbrevation: Stores the country code concatenated with the state abbrevation

physicalColumns.name: City
physicalColumns.description: City: Stores city information as a text

physicalColumns.name: State_Province_Abbrv
physicalColumns.description: State Province Abbrevation: Stores the state province abbrevation as a text

physicalColumns.name: Estab_Name
physicalColumns.description: Establishment Name: Stores the establishment name as a text

physicalColumns.name: Postal_Code
physicalColumns.description: Postal Code: Stores the postal code information as a double
